My current work focuses on the influence of parental and sibling phenotype on partner choice and is part of the  [KINSHIP](https://erc.europa.eu/) project.  

For my undegratduarte project also at the University of Glasgow I investigated  women's perceived sexual orientation and it's association with traits viable in their faces, supervised by [Ben Jones](http://facelab.org/People/benjones).
